line1.lustrous_moon_mob.yang_jian: From the lofty Sanqing to the heavenly soldiers, is this the grand spectacle you have wrought?
line2.lustrous_moon_mob.yang_jian: Do you know if your four companions are faring well?
line3.lustrous_moon_mob.yang_jian: Jiyue Demon Lord, I have given you chance after chance, yet you remain ungrateful!
